00088 typedef enum 
00089 {
00090    LQP_NOPRESET         =-1,
00091 
00092    // QUALITY PRESETS
00093    LQP_NORMAL_QUALITY      = 0,

00123 typedef struct {
00124    DWORD dwConfig;         // BE_CONFIG_XXXXX
00125                         // Currently only BE_CONFIG_MP3 is supported
00126    union {
00127 
00128       struct   {
00129 
00130          DWORD dwSampleRate;     // 48000, 44100 and 32000 allowed
00131          BYTE  byMode;        // BE_MP3_MODE_STEREO, BE_MP3_MODE_DUALCHANNEL, BE_MP3_MODE_MONO
00132          WORD  wBitrate;      // 32, 40, 48, 56, 64, 80, 96, 112, 128, 160, 192, 224, 256 and 320 allowed
00133          BOOL  bPrivate;      
00134          BOOL  bCRC;
00135          BOOL  bCopyright;
00136          BOOL  bOriginal;
00137 
00138          } mp3;               // BE_CONFIG_MP3
00139 
00140          struct
00141          {
00142          // STRUCTURE INFORMATION
00143          DWORD       dwStructVersion;  
00144          DWORD       dwStructSize;
00145 
00146          // BASIC ENCODER SETTINGS
00147          DWORD       dwSampleRate;     // SAMPLERATE OF INPUT FILE
00148          DWORD       dwReSampleRate;      // DOWNSAMPLERATE, 0=ENCODER DECIDES  
00149          LONG        nMode;            // BE_MP3_MODE_STEREO, BE_MP3_MODE_DUALCHANNEL, BE_MP3_MODE_MONO
00150          DWORD       dwBitrate;        // CBR bitrate, VBR min bitrate
00151          DWORD       dwMaxBitrate;     // CBR ignored, VBR Max bitrate
00152          LONG        nPreset;       // Quality preset, use one of the settings of the LAME_QUALITY_PRESET enum
00153          DWORD       dwMpegVersion;    // FUTURE USE, MPEG-1 OR MPEG-2
00154          DWORD       dwPsyModel;       // FUTURE USE, SET TO 0
00155          DWORD       dwEmphasis;       // FUTURE USE, SET TO 0
00156 
00157          // BIT STREAM SETTINGS
00158          BOOL        bPrivate;         // Set Private Bit (TRUE/FALSE)
00159          BOOL        bCRC;          // Insert CRC (TRUE/FALSE)
00160          BOOL        bCopyright;       // Set Copyright Bit (TRUE/FALSE)
00161          BOOL        bOriginal;        // Set Original Bit (TRUE/FALSE)
00162          
00163          // VBR STUFF
00164          BOOL        bWriteVBRHeader;  // WRITE XING VBR HEADER (TRUE/FALSE)
00165          BOOL        bEnableVBR;       // USE VBR ENCODING (TRUE/FALSE)
00166          INT            nVBRQuality;      // VBR QUALITY 0..9
00167          DWORD       dwVbrAbr_bps;     // Use ABR in stead of nVBRQuality
00168          VBRMETHOD      nVbrMethod;
00169          BOOL        bNoRes;           // Disable Bit resorvoir (TRUE/FALSE)
00170 
00171          BOOL        bStrictIso;       // Use strict ISO encoding rules (TRUE/FALSE)
00172             
00173          BYTE        btReserved[255-4*sizeof(DWORD)]; // FUTURE USE, SET TO 0
00174 
00175          } LHV1;              // LAME header version 1
00176 
00177       struct   {
00178 
00179          DWORD dwSampleRate;
00180          BYTE  byMode;
00181          WORD  wBitrate;
00182          BYTE  byEncodingMethod;
00183 
00184       } aac;
00185 
00186    } format;
00187       
00188 } BE_CONFIG, *PBE_CONFIG;

00215    BYTE  byMMXEnabled;
00216

00218 
00219 
00220 } BE_VERSION, *PBE_VERSION;
